name: PSG - Gridless Turn based Prototype
description:
An old prototype I fixed up to put out here and get some basic feedback on.

WASD to move -  Mouse buttons to activate weapons - Scrollwheel to switch

Weapons have time and stamina uses. Gain stamina after each enemy turn.

Potions do not work. Did not get that far. If you mouse over the bar  you can scroll to bring your weapons back. Bug that I never fixed.

Only the two slime enemies are in.

Press C to restart.

Could go a lot of ways with this if I pick it back up.
Any comments appreciated.
